website_summaries.verdict: Canon's mirrorless EOS M100 camera delivers SLR image quality and fast autofocus in a compact build with a touch LCD that makes it easy for anyone to use.
cons: Not a lot of native lenses available
Touch interface will turn off pros and shutterbugs

customer_reviews.title: Well...this has really opened my eyes to Canon!
customer_reviews.text: Trying to shoot video on my iPhone is in the past, now I have this new camera. Had it for around 6 weeks and totally LOVE it! I've never had a Canon before, but I'm really impressed. The video function is easy to use, has a flip up screen to check yourself out on, and the still image element has loads of great features to help create the best pic you can. The best thing about it is the crisp high def that you get, and you can even shoot in low light. I bought lights for my studio, but haven't really had to use them yet (and I'm shooting in Jan/Feb). Very chuffed with this, and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Julia M

customer_reviews.title: Compact and just as good as the large versions.
customer_reviews.text: Need a small version of my digital canon eos 1200 for traveling and it just the ticket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superb budget camera
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box great images but much more to learn about from the 370 page manual. Remember to get the proper lens hood, UV filter and screen protector and I recommend the extra warranty too as it's too expensive to repair compared to the premium. There, now you're all set. Oh, about the 11-22mm lens...
customer_reviews.author: Triphazard

customer_reviews.title: Small size good and bad
customer_reviews.text: Small dslr that's easy to carry around, but controls are too small and fiddly. Supplied charger looks after-market but works ok.
customer_reviews.author: R. Warren

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel camera
customer_reviews.text: I needed a good quality mirror less for travel photography and I have to say I’m extremely pleased with the M100. I paired it with an EF-M 22m f/2.0 which is a lot better than the kit lens in terms of colour aberration and quality.
customer_reviews.author: MaxUK

customer_reviews.title: Great value and the usual Canon quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for Vlogging and it does the job perfectly for me. Its a nice camera with a great feel in the hand and the option for different lenses etc is a bonus. Canon quality as ever.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Watson

customer_reviews.title: Simple operation - stunning features
customer_reviews.text: Fits the bill. I didn't want a huge (bridge) camera, but I wanted something reliable that could take good photos in low light. This does just that.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Rogerson

customer_reviews.title: recommended
customer_reviews.text: easy to use. many manual setting to discover. auto focus is great.
customer_reviews.author: Nur Adlina Haji Azman

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous camera. I love my DSLR but this just what I wanted for a camera to take on holiday etc without the hassle of camera bags etc. Considering it’s size I can use with manual settings as normal. Love it!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera!
customer_reviews.text: All the joy of a heavy DSLR with the ease of use of a smartphone camera. Intelligent auto focus. Swivel screen great for photographing difficult angles. This is my out and about shooter.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Great travel camera
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Bought it for traveling and the size and weigh is great. Very easy to use too
customer_reviews.author: Iaina

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great autofocus, decent video and photo quality. Great item for its price. Metal body feels premium + there is adapter (not included) for standard canon lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Eghour

customer_reviews.title: Good picture, not so good video
customer_reviews.text: Pictures are excellent but the video quality is not great. Very jerky.
customer_reviews.author: Mr I

customer_reviews.title: Mini camera, easy to use, possibility to change lenses
customer_reviews.text: Everything is ok. Fast delivery and good packing. It was the present for my mom, she is sooo happy now :) easy to use, with a lot of settings!
customer_reviews.author: Goddute

customer_reviews.title: Canon EOS M100 with kit lens
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for beginner. Very small, light, easy interface, and takes excellent pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Indri

customer_reviews.title: Good support from amazon UK
customer_reviews.text: The product was faulty, so returned I was was not impressed by Canon support in the UK
customer_reviews.author: Dave Paver

customer_reviews.title: Quality is good. but the cap is hard to be securely ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good. but the cap is hard to be securely locked and wifi connection is bit hassle comparatively.
customer_reviews.author: sophia

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I use this little gem for Marco & landscape photos & have just started using shutter mode to capture moving cars & blurry back grounds' it does the job superbly, I wanted to upgrade from a Sony hx5 point & shoot to something that gave me dlsr quality images but without being to technical & this fits the bill perfectly, with so many cameras to choose from I'm glad that I got the m100.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew moz

product_meta.title: Canon EOS M100 with EF-M 15 - 45 mm lens - Black
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Black| Style Name:KitCanon EOS M100 with EF-M 15-45 mm Lens - Black.

BOX CONTAINS
EOS M100 body EF-M15-45mm Lens Face Jacket EH31-FJ Camera Cover R-F-4 Strap EM-300DB Interface Cable IFC-600PCU Battery Charger LC-E17 Battery Pack LP-E17 Power Cable
feature_bullets: Pin-sharp photos and cinematic full HD movies using 24.2 MP CMOS sensor with tiltable touch screen
DSLR power in a portable body that catches all the action with fast 6.1 FPS shooting
Enjoy smartphone-like touch control and easy sharing via Bluetooth, Wi-Fi and the Canon Connect app
Operating System Compatibility is Windows Version 10, 8.1, 8, 7 SP1 [24], 10.9, 10.10, 10.11 and 10.12

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars49 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
